str2: Wherefore, on which account, therefore. From dia and hos; through which thing, i.e. Consequently.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From the same as oikodome; to be a house-builder, i.e. Construct or confirm.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
